column4: The Group measures the use of metals and non-metals in the vehicles. At the moment it is not yet possible for the Group as a whole to break down the total weight of its vehicles into renewable and non-renewable materials. In the future the Mercedes-Benz Group intends to continually expand the use of renewable materials and integrate them into its calculation methods.
